name: Pi.Alert
short_description: Network monitoring tool for detecting new devices and security alerts.
description: Network monitoring tool for detecting new devices and security alerts. Pi.Alert is a self-hosted application focused on network, monitoring, security, dashboard. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Pi.Alert on your home server to network monitoring tool for detecting new devices and security alerts without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Pi.Alert to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
